name: Podio Darcula
description: A reskin of the Podio application using the color swatch Darcula found in Jetbrains IDEs. Now updated to include spreadsheets and pop up boxes. Now in version 1.5
additional_info: Podio is a great tool but I find all the white gives me constant headaches. Since I work with it all day and the team there is in no rush to release a dark theme I decided to install stylish and see if I couldn't tone down it's brightness using the amazing Darcula theme swatch by Jetbrains. This is version 1.5, there is some skinning yet to be done but it is still miles easier to look at than the Podio default skin. If you like my theme please give me a review. The more users the better it can become! NEW IN 1.5 ========= Chat window fully skinned Comments boxes skinned Deliverable alternatve views skinned properly Known & Outstanding Issues ============ Some images used by podio have white backgrounds (no current fix) TinyMCE not behaving for coloring rules Completion buttons on deliverable highlight wrong color Button colors need updated Subheader color needs corrected Please comment on other found issues. SPECIAL THANKS Jetbrains (http://jetbrains.com) for creating the Darcula color swatch! Stylish (https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/stylish/fjnbnpbmkenffdnngjfgmeleoegfcffe?hl=en) for their great plugin Podio (http://podio.com) for creating world class project management software Last but not least, thanks to you for taking the time to look and maybe install my style. Leave a comment with any suggestions, bugs, or other ways to improve the skin!
